issuerKeys.description: list of issuer keys, listed in descending date order (most recent first). V1.2 change: renamed from issuer_key, added optional invalidated field.

date.description: ISO-8601 formatted date time the key was activated.

key.description: Bitcoin address (compressed public key, usually 24 characters) that the issuer uses to issue the certificates.

invalidated.description: Optional ISO-8601 formatted date time the key was invalidated.

revocationKeys.description: list of revocation keys, listed in descending date order (most recent first). V1.2 changes: renamed from revocation_key, added optional invalidated field.

date.description: ISO-8601 formatted date time the key was activated.

key.description: Bitcoin address (compressed public key, usually 24 characters) that the issuer uses to revoke the certificates.

invalidated.description: Optional ISO-8601 formatted date time the key was invalidated.

id.description: The URL of the issuer's website or homepage

name.description: Human-readable name of the issuing entity

email.description: Contact address for the individual or organization.

url.description: The URL where the issuer's certificates can be found

introductionURL.description: The URL hosting the issuer's introduction endpoint

image.description: Data URI; a base-64 encoded png image of the issuer's image. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_URI_scheme
